segments.text: That sink overflow is disgusting; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and floor like a filthy flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes while standing in that mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron will be ruined if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are in a dirty kitchen now, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks grimy, and he's climbing it anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle water mixing with whatever's on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this unclean disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral face while everything's filthy around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies from the jar in this environment? Yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
